# authentik_user (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a user

resource "authentik_user" "name" {
  username = "user"
  name     = "User"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- **name** (String)
- **username** (String)

### Optional

- **attributes** (String) Defaults to `{}`.
- **email** (String)
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **is_active** (Boolean) Defaults to `true`.
